pricing.title: Simple pricing. Massive value.
pricing.description: All plans include 125+ AI commands. Pick what fits your agency.

switch.a: Yes! Upgrade or downgrade anytime. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.

trial.a: Yes! 7-day free trial on all plans. Your card is charged after the trial ends - cancel anytime before to avoid charges.

methods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
methods.a: Credit/Debit cards, PayPal, and Crypto (USDT/USDC). All payments secured by Polar.sh.

guarantee.title: 30-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.description: Not satisfied? Get a full refund within 30 days. No questions asked.

faq_page.title: FAQ - AgencyOS
faq_page.description: Frequently asked questions about AgencyOS, pricing, and getting started.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Got questions? We've got answers.

faq_page.no_results: No questions found. Try a different search.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.subtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to our team.

questions.a: AgencyOS is an AI-powered operating system for solo agencies. It includes 125+ commands to automate marketing, sales, affiliate management, and finance tasks.
After purchase, you get access to a private GitHub repository. Clone it locally and open in your IDE. Run the setup script and you're ready to go.
No! AgencyOS is designed for non-technical users. Just type natural language commands like /marketing/social or /sales/proposal and the AI handles the rest.

questions.q: What's included in the free trial?
questions.a: The 7-day free trial includes all Starter tier features: 20 AI commands, basic marketing automation, and community support.

questions.q: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
questions.a: Yes! You can switch plans at any time. Upgrades are prorated, and downgrades take effect at the next billing cycle.
Absolutely. We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, email us and we'll refund you, no questions asked.
AgencyOS includes 125+ commands across marketing, sales, affiliate, finance, and content creation. New commands are added monthly.
Yes! Pro and Franchise tiers include the ability to create and save custom command templates.

questions.q: Does it integrate with my existing tools?
questions.a: AgencyOS works with popular tools like Notion, Google Workspace, Slack, and more through our MCP (Model Context Protocol) integrations.
Starter users get community support via Discord. Pro users get priority email support. Franchise users get dedicated 1:1 onboarding calls.
Yes! Join our Discord community with 500+ agency owners sharing tips, templates, and wins.
We have comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and a blog with tips and best practices.

final_cta.subtitle: Start free. Cancel anytime. Win forever.
